committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: Directing the Federal Open Market Committee of the Federal Reserve System to adopt and pursue monetary policies leading to, and maintaining, zero inflation.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Open Market Committee of the Federal Reserve System to pursue monetary policies: (1) designed to reduce inflation gradually to zero; and (2) intended to maintain inflation at zero if it deviates from such level.

titles.title: Directing the Federal Open Market Committee of the Federal Reserve System to adopt and pursue monetary policies leading to, and maintaining, zero inflation.
